about_the_game:
A Mysterious Puzzle Game
Most can’t handle the isolation of Skellig, a rocky island in the middle of the ocean. Nevertheless, the guild of Keepers look after its ancient lighthouse.

You play as Skellig’s latest Keeper, now entering your 40th year of service. After receiving a curious piece of information from a strange being, you start to unravel the secrets of the island, which go far deeper than you ever could have imagined.

Crossword Inspired Gameplay

The Secrets of Skellig is a third-person puzzle game, controlled with a keyboard and mouse. You interact with tiles, filling them with letters and words to answer clues and solve puzzles.
